   19: %%
   20: -module(subgroups_1_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: all() ->
   27:     [{group, subgroup_return_fail},
   28:      {group, subgroup_init_fail},
   29:      {group, subgroup_after_failed_case},
   30:      {group, case_after_subgroup_return_fail},
   31:      {group, case_after_subgroup_fail_init}].
   32: 
   33: groups() ->
   34:     [{return_fail, [], [failing_tc]},
   35:      {fail_init, [], [ok_tc]},
   36:      {ok_group, [], [ok_tc]},
   37: 
   38:      {subgroup_return_fail, [sequence], [{group, return_fail}, {group, ok_group}]},
   39: 
   40:      {subgroup_init_fail, [sequence], [{group, fail_init}, {group, ok_group}]},
   41: 
   42:      {subgroup_after_failed_case, [sequence], [failing_tc, {group, ok_group}]},
   43: 
   44:      {case_after_subgroup_return_fail, [sequence], [{group, return_fail}, ok_tc]},
   45: 
   46:      {case_after_subgroup_fail_init, [sequence], [{group, fail_init}, ok_tc]}
   47:     ].
   48: 
   49: failed_subgroup(subgroup_return_fail) -> return_fail;
   50: failed_subgroup(subgroup_init_fail) -> fail_init;
   51: failed_subgroup(case_after_subgroup_return_fail) -> return_fail;
   52: failed_subgroup(case_after_subgroup_fail_init) -> fail_init;
   53: failed_subgroup(_) -> undefined.
   54: 
   55: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   56:     Config.
   57: 
   58: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   59:     ok.
   60: 
   61: init_per_group(fail_init, Config) ->
   62:     ct:comment(fail_init),
   63:     exit(init_per_group_fails_on_purpose);
   64: 
   65: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   66:     ct:comment(Group),
   67:     [{Group,failed_subgroup(Group)} | Config].
   68: 
   69: end_per_group(subgroup_after_failed_case, Config) ->
   70:     ct:comment(subgroup_after_failed_case),
   71:     Status = ?config(tc_group_result, Config),
   72:     [{subgroups_1_SUITE,failing_tc}] = proplists:get_value(failed, Status),
   73:     {return_group_result,failed};
   74: 
   75: end_per_group(Group, Config) when Group == subgroup_return_fail;
   76: 				  Group == subgroup_init_fail;
   77: 				  Group == case_after_subgroup_return_fail;
   78: 				  Group == case_after_subgroup_fail_init ->
   79:     ct:comment(Group),
   80:     Status = ?config(tc_group_result, Config),
   81:     Failed = proplists:get_value(failed, Status),
   82:     true = lists:member({group_result,?config(Group,Config)}, Failed),
   83:     {return_group_result,failed};
   84: 
   85: end_per_group(return_fail, Config) ->
   86:     ct:comment(return_fail),
   87:     Status = ?config(tc_group_result, Config),
   88:     [{subgroups_1_SUITE,failing_tc}] = proplists:get_value(failed, Status),
   89:     {return_group_result,failed};
   90: 
   91: end_per_group(Group, _Config) ->
   92:     ct:comment(Group),
   93:     ok.
   94: 
   95: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   96:     Config.
   97: 
   98: end_per_testcase(failing_tc, Config) ->
   99:     {failed,_} = proplists:get_value(tc_status, Config),
  100:     ok;
  101: 
  102: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  103:     ok.
  104: 
  105: failing_tc(_Config) ->
  106:     2=3.
  107: 
  108: ok_tc(_Config) ->
  109:     ok.
